page.title: 11Houses in our area.
page.content: Buildings today are made of concrete blocks or bricks. Some may be built with granite,bradstone, Delabole stone or the Cornish rustic stone. Some are {detatched}while others are{terraced}or {semi-detatched.}Across the road from me are some new{flats}called Chywoon Gardens.Before the flats there was a field with a horse.{Newer houses}have been built for people moving into the area.{Older houses}were built of{stone or{cob.}Many are being made bigger and renovated for which you can get {Council grants.}Mr.and Mrs.Simmons live at{Nance Farm}which was mentioned in the{Domesday Book.}The back of the house is original.Inside are{wall {paintings}which are about{300 years {old}.They are of St.Luke and St.John and may have been painted by monks. There are 11 around the room but 9 are covered with wooden panels.
